name: Beverages
description: A wide selection of refreshing drinks, from sodas to freshly squeezed juices, perfect to complement your meal.

name: Appetizers
description: Start your meal with our flavorful appetizers, carefully crafted to tease your taste buds.

name: Main Courses
description: Delight in our hearty main courses, featuring a variety of cuisines to suit every palate.

name: Desserts
description: Indulge in our sweet treats, a perfect ending to your meal with delicious and beautifully crafted desserts.

name: Soups
description: Enjoy our selection of warm and comforting soups, perfect for any time of the day.

name: Salads
description: Fresh and healthy salads made with crisp vegetables, delightful dressings, and premium ingredients.

name: Breakfast
description: Start your day right with our delicious breakfast options, crafted to energize your morning.

name: Snacks
description: A range of quick bites and light snacks to keep you going throughout the day.

name: Vegan Options
description: Explore our plant-based menu featuring flavorful vegan dishes for a guilt-free dining experience.

name: Seafood
description: Dive into our selection of fresh seafood dishes, prepared with care to bring out natural flavors.
